content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price negotiation for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] What was your initial offer for the rental price of the apartment?
[Answer] My initial offer for the rental price of the apartment was 450 Euro per month.

[Question] What was the landlord's initial offer for the rental price of the apartment?
[Answer] The landlord's initial offer for the rental price of the apartment was 550 Euro per month.

[Question] What was the final agreed price for the rental of the apartment?
[Answer] The final agreed price for the rental of the apartment was 525 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner?
[Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as an 8.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended?
[Answer] No
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
[Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation process.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Thank you for your time and cooperation. Is there anything else you would like to add?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Is there anything else you would like to add?
[Answer] No, I think I've covered everything in the conversation. Thank you.
name: Yi-Nuo
